item.title: Suitable access required., 31st October
item.description:
A stepped side exit/entrance by the public toilets on Ridley road market needs to be appropriate for those hauling weighty shopping in their trolleys, for pushchairs, wheel chairs and mobility scooters. Make a nonslip ramp.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Birkbeck Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous Fence, 31st October
item.description:
This fence along the pedestrian passage between Red Post Hill and Upper Cul de sac of Casino Avenue has been deteriorating over the past year. It is the boundary to a council tenant house and we informed the council last year. It is dangerous ans could potentially I hut someone if it falls on them. The passage is also dangerously uneven and over grown. Please action asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Red Post Hill, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large holes in pacement several inches deeep, 31st October
item.description:
This has been like this for months. Not enough space for wheelchairs to pass safely. Last night I tipped out my wheelchair due to the precut holes in pavement and not enough light to see them. They are inches deep and a hazard to those that use that pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burnhill Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
